posts.author: Charlie
posts.text: My best friend Adela and Billie had such a beautiful ceremony, but we are all freezing out here so it's time for me to play some tunes and dance the night away to some Ska.

replies.author: Finley
replies.text: I'm so sad I couldn't be there!

replies.author: Charlie
replies.text: Such a shame, I hope you'll get well soon!

posts.author: Charlie
posts.text: At Adela's reception. I think I just knocked over a full glass of beer over the wedding cake! Hoping no one saw...

posts.author: Davy
posts.text: Just got home from Billie and Adela's wedding. Great party, but the cake tasted awful.

replies.author: Elliott
replies.text: Yeah, I don't know what they put into that cake, but it wasn't a success

posts.author: Finley
posts.text: I just had the loveliest cake at Davy and Elliott's wedding reception

posts.author: Gab
posts.text: It's hot as balls at this wedding! Whose idea was it to do a ceremony in a poorly ventilated room in the middle of June!

posts.author: Charlie
posts.text: My big concert is already next month!

posts.author: Lindsay
posts.text: New! A trombone that you can play with just one hand! Great for concerts!

replies.author: Elliott
replies.text: I know someone that uses on of those for their coming concert!

posts.author: D
posts.text: There's no way I'll spend a whole evening listening to someone playing a jawharp! That'll be some concert!

posts.author: Elliott
posts.text: Finley and I promised a friend to attend their Beethoven concert, but I can't stand that. Give me Ska any day!

replies.author: Gab
replies.text: I also cancelled. I really don't want to miss Charlie!

posts.author: Harley
posts.text: As much as I want to hear how someone plays a trombone with a single arm, I really want to hear Charlie play! Shame, if it weren't a Beethoven concert, I would've been there.

replies.author: Gab
replies.text: I also cancelled. I really don't want to miss Charlie!

posts.author: I
posts.text: Extended due to success! J and I will perform for the third evening in a row at Ramsey's Pianobar! Come and listen to the sweet tones of J's trombone and my jawharp for an evening full of jazz!

posts.author: Kim
posts.text: In next week's concert, I'll be performing some Beethoven on my kazoo. Everyone is invited!

replies.author: Harley
replies.text: I'd have to check whether I can make that!

posts.author: Finley
posts.text: Kim and I where on the escalator when it broke yesterday! Now we're both in the hospital. Kim broke his leg and my arm is in casts.

replies.author: Kim
replies.text: It was terrifying! My lawyer will certainly hear about this!

posts.author: Adela
posts.text: I just saw Max getting hit by his best friend's car. He got away with just a broken arm, but his favourith trombone wasn't so lucky.

posts.author: Nikita
posts.text: Forgot to put the handbrake on. It rolled right over me when I got something from the trunk. Broke my arm and the tree in my front yard has kicked the bucket.

replies.author: Elliott
replies.text: Always the clutz, @Nikita! Get well soon!
